column4: so you basically want to copy your config from the hard partition that is working fine to the partition that is having issues??
not just the config, but everything gtk-related (just the config didn't work)

it's not as easy as you make it sound, if you wanted an actual copy you could use gparted to make an exact copy of your partition and copy it to your other partition, what youre attempting to do is not reasonable, youre trying to perform a magic trick
well, the other option is to reinstall ubuntu
